# Change Log

All notable changes to Happy Cat API will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [1.0.0] - 2026-01-26

### Added
- Initial release of Happy Cat API
- User authentication and authorization system
- JWT-based authentication
- Role-based access control (RBAC)
- User management module
- Groups management module
- Lessons and courses module
- Discussions and comments system
- Badges and achievements system
- Progress tracking system
- Notifications system
- Payment integration
- Cloudflare R2 integration for file storage
- Redis caching layer
- MongoDB database integration
- Email verification system
- OTP verification
- Invitation codes system
- API documentation with Swagger
- Comprehensive test coverage
- Docker support
- CI/CD pipelines

### Security
- Implemented JWT authentication
- Added rate limiting
- Input validation with class-validator
- SQL injection prevention
- XSS protection
- CORS configuration
- Helmet security headers

## [0.9.0] - 2025-12-15

### Added
- Beta release for testing
- Core API endpoints
- Basic authentication
- User CRUD operations
- File upload functionality

### Changed
- Improved error handling
- Enhanced validation rules

### Fixed
- Various bug fixes from alpha testing

## [0.1.0] - 2025-11-01

### Added
- Initial alpha release
- Project structure setup
- Basic NestJS configuration
- Database connection
- Environment configuration

---

## Types of changes

- `Added` for new features
- `Changed` for changes in existing functionality
- `Deprecated` for soon-to-be removed features
- `Removed` for now removed features
- `Fixed` for any bug fixes
- `Security` in case of vulnerabilities
